document_data.name: Drum Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Drum Tower''' was the main alarm system for the city of [[Manass]] in [[Khazari]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Found in the center of the city near the [[Boyla's Court]], the Drum Tower sported red beams, a black-tiled roof, and shining brass fittings. The tower stood three stories high. A large drum hung from rafters at the top of the tower.
document_data.Activities: The drum tower was used to rouse the militia, served as a fire alarm, and announced special proclamations occurring in the courtyard below. The Master of the Drum lived in quarters found at the base of the tower.
